page.title: 14INDUSTRY IN ASHFORD
page.content: There are 7 farms in the area.They are;Highfields,Churchdale,Red House, Broad Roads,Greenfields,Hall Farm & Park Farm,also 2 small holdings worked part-time.Most use family labour only,but some have patr-time hired help. There are 3 pubs,using part-time labour,mainly,selling beer,wines & spirits to locals & visitors,also 2 private hotels providing accommodation. One boasts a fine restaurant.8cottages are available for family lettings, up-wards of 20 homes take in visitors on a bed & breakfast basis. The village has 2 cafes serving refreshments,and 3 shops (including the post office) trading in groceries,green groceries and goods in the tourist trade.
